content.question: The mortuary temple of Hatshepsut originally included which of the following features as part of the complex?

choices.label: A pylon entryway flanked by large obelisks
Outer courtyards with heavily ornamented fountains
Grand stairways decorated with reliefs of important battles
Terraces filled with exotic trees and plants

content.answer: Terraces filled with exotic trees and plants

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
